text: Vladimir Mikhailovich Dilman (19 July 1925 – 21 May 1994) was a Russian scientist and physician. He served on the staff of the N.N. Petrov Research Institute of Oncology for many years. He contributed to the development of oncology, endocrinology and gerontology. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1994 deaths Category:20th-century Russian physicians Category:Russian scientists
title: Vladimir Dilman
